member.name: T:WebPDotNet.AlphaCompression
member.summary: Specifies the algorithm for encoding the alpha plane.

member.name: F:WebPDotNet.AlphaCompression.None
member.summary: Specifies that the alpha plane is not compressed.

member.name: F:WebPDotNet.AlphaCompression.CompressedWithWebP
member.summary: Specifies that the alpha plane is compressed with WebP lossless.

member.name: T:WebPDotNet.AlphaFiltering
member.summary: Specifies the predictive filtering method for alpha plane.

member.name: F:WebPDotNet.AlphaFiltering.None
member.summary: Specifies that the predictive filtering method is not used.

member.name: F:WebPDotNet.AlphaFiltering.Fast
member.summary: Specifies that the fast method is used.

member.name: F:WebPDotNet.AlphaFiltering.Best
member.summary: Specifies that the best method is used.

member.name: T:WebPDotNet.CspMode
member.summary: Specifies the color spaces.

member.name: F:WebPDotNet.CspMode.RGB
member.summary: Specifies that the format is 24 bits per pixel; 8 bits each are used for the red, green, and blue components.

member.name: F:WebPDotNet.CspMode.RGBA
member.summary: Specifies that the format is 32 bits per pixel; 8 bits each are used for the red, green, blue, and alpha components.

member.name: F:WebPDotNet.CspMode.BGR
member.summary: Specifies that the format is 24 bits per pixel; 8 bits each are used for the blue, green, and red components.

member.name: F:WebPDotNet.CspMode.BGRA
member.summary: Specifies that the format is 32 bits per pixel; 8 bits each are used for the blue, green, red, and alpha components.

member.name: F:WebPDotNet.CspMode.ARGB
member.summary: Specifies that the format is 32 bits per pixel; 8 bits each are used for the alpha, red, green, and blue components.

member.name: F:WebPDotNet.CspMode.RGBA4444
member.summary: Specifies that the format is 16 bits per pixel; 4 bits each are used for the red, green, blue, and alpha components.

member.name: F:WebPDotNet.CspMode.RGB565
member.summary: Specifies that the format is 16 bits per pixel; 5 bits are used for the red component, 6 bits are used for the green component, and 5 bits are used for the blue component.

member.name: F:WebPDotNet.CspMode.PRGBA
member.summary: Specifies that the format is 32 bits per pixel; 8 bits each are used for the red, green, blue, and alpha components. The red, green, and blue components are premultiplied, according to the alpha component.

member.name: F:WebPDotNet.CspMode.PBGRA
member.summary: Specifies that the format is 32 bits per pixel; 8 bits each are used for the blue, green, red, and alpha components. The blue, green, and red components are premultiplied, according to the alpha component.

member.name: F:WebPDotNet.CspMode.PARGB
member.summary: Specifies that the format is 32 bits per pixel; 8 bits each are used for the alpha, red, green, and blue components. The red, green, and blue components are premultiplied, according to the alpha component.

member.name: F:WebPDotNet.CspMode.PRGBA4444
member.summary: Specifies that the format is 16 bits per pixel; 4 bits each are used for the red, green, blue, and alpha components. The red, green, and blue components are premultiplied, according to the alpha component.

member.name: F:WebPDotNet.CspMode.YUV
member.summary: Specifies that the format is YUV, without transparency.

member.name: F:WebPDotNet.CspMode.YUVA
member.summary: Specifies that the format is YUVA, without transparency.

member.name: F:WebPDotNet.CspMode.Last
member.summary: Specifies that the format is not specified.

member.summary: Specifies that the filtering type is simple.

member.summary: Specifies that the filtering type is strong.

member.summary: Specifies the preprocessing filter.

member.summary: Specifies that the preprocessing filter is not used.

member.name: M:WebPDotNet.WebP.WebPGetInfo(System.Byte[],System.Int32@,System.Int32@)
member.summary: Validate the WebP image data and retrieve the image width and height.
member.param: The WebP image data to decode.
When this method returns, contains the width, in pixels, of WebP image, if is WebP image; otherwise, 0. This parameter is passed uninitialized.
When this method returns, contains the height, in pixels, of WebP image, if is WebP image; otherwise, 0. This parameter is passed uninitialized.
member.returns: true if is WebP image; otherwise, false.

member.summary: Return the encoder's version number.
member.returns: A represents version number.

member.name: M:WebPDotNet.WebP.WebPEncodeRGB(System.Byte[],System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Single)
member.summary: Encodes RGB image data to WebP image.
member.param: The RGB image data to encode.
The width, in pixels, of the raw RGB image to encode.
The height, in pixels, of the raw RGB image to encode.
The stride, in bytes, of the raw RGB image to encode.
The value to control the loss and quality during compression. It ranges from 0 to 100.
member.exception: , and must be more than 0. Or must be from 0 to 100.
member.returns: A new .

member.name: M:WebPDotNet.WebP.WebPConfigPreset(WebPDotNet.WebPConfig,WebPDotNet.WebPPreset,System.Single)
member.summary: Initialize the configuration according to a predefined set of parameters and a given quality factor.
member.param: The compression parameters to initialize.
The predefined settings for .
The value to control the loss and quality during compression. It ranges from 0 to 100.
member.returns: true if has no error; otherwise, false.

member.name: M:WebPDotNet.WebP.WebPConfigLosslessPreset(WebPDotNet.WebPConfig,System.Int32)
member.summary: Activate the lossless compression mode with the desired efficiency level.
member.param: The compression parameters to activate.
The desired efficiency level. It ranges from 0 to 9. 0 is fastest and 9 is slower. A good default level is 6.
member.returns: true if has no error; otherwise, false.

member.name: M:WebPDotNet.WebP.WebPValidateConfig(WebPDotNet.WebPConfig)
member.summary: Validates whether specified configuration has no error or not.
member.param: The compression parameters to validate.
member.returns: true if has no error; otherwise, false.

member.name: T:WebPDotNet.WebPConfig
member.summary: Defines the compression parameters. This class cannot be inherited.

member.name: M:WebPDotNet.WebPConfig.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: P:WebPDotNet.WebPConfig.AlphaCompression
member.summary: Sets or get the algorithm for encoding the alpha plane.

member.name: P:WebPDotNet.WebPConfig.AlphaFiltering
member.summary: Sets or get the predictive filtering method for alpha plane.

member.name: P:WebPDotNet.WebPConfig.AlphaQuality
member.summary: Sets or get the value for alpha compression between 0 and 100.
member.returns: The value for alpha compression between 0 and 100.

member.name: P:WebPDotNet.WebPConfig.AutoFilter
member.summary: Sets or get the value indicating whether using auto adjust filter's strength.
member.returns: true if using auto adjust filter's strength; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:WebPDotNet.WebPConfig.EmulateJpegSize
member.summary: Sets or get the value indicating whether compression parameters will be remapped to better match the expected output size from JPEG compression.
member.returns: true if compression parameters will be remapped to better match the expected output size from JPEG compression; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:WebPDotNet.WebPConfig.Exact
member.summary: Sets or get the value indicating whether preserve the exact RGB values under transparent area.
member.returns: true if preserve the exact RGB values under transparent area, false.

member.name: P:WebPDotNet.WebPConfig.FilterSharpness
member.summary: Sets or get the value for sharpness filter between 0 and 7.
member.returns: The value for sharpness filter.

member.name: P:WebPDotNet.WebPConfig.FilterStrength
member.summary: Sets or get the value for strength of filter between 0 and 100.
member.returns: The strength of filter.

member.name: P:WebPDotNet.WebPConfig.FilterType
member.summary: Sets or get the value for filter type.

member.name: P:WebPDotNet.WebPConfig.ImageHint
member.summary: Sets or get the value of hint for image type.

member.name: P:WebPDotNet.WebPConfig.Lossless
member.summary: Sets or get the value indicating whether using lossless encoding.
member.returns: true if using lossless encoding, false.

member.name: P:WebPDotNet.WebPConfig.LowMemory
member.summary: Sets or get the value indicating whether reduce memory usage (but increase CPU use).
member.returns: true if reduce memory usage, false.

member.name: P:WebPDotNet.WebPConfig.Method
member.summary: Sets or get the value for quality/speed trade-off between 0 and 6. 0 is fast and 6 is slower-better.
member.returns: The value for quality/speed trade-off.

member.name: P:WebPDotNet.WebPConfig.NearLossless
member.summary: Sets or get the value of near lossless encoding between 0 (max-loss) and 100 (off).
member.returns: The value of near lossless encoding between 0 (max-loss) and 100 (off).

member.name: P:WebPDotNet.WebPConfig.PartitionLimit
member.summary: Sets or get the value of quality degradation allowed to fit the 512k limit on prediction modes coding (0: no degradation, 100: maximum possible degradation).
member.returns: The value of quality degradation allowed to fit the 512k limit on prediction modes coding.

member.name: P:WebPDotNet.WebPConfig.Partitions
member.summary: Sets or get the log2 (number of token partitions) in from 0 to 3.
member.returns: The log2 (number of token partitions) in from 0 to 3. Default is set to 0 for easier progressive decoding.

member.name: P:WebPDotNet.WebPConfig.Pass
member.summary: Sets or get the number of entropy-analysis passes between 1 to 10.
member.returns: The number of entropy-analysis passes between 1 to 10.

member.name: P:WebPDotNet.WebPConfig.Preprocessing
member.summary: Sets or get the value of preprocessing filter.

member.name: P:WebPDotNet.WebPConfig.QMax
member.summary: Sets or get the value of maximum permissible quality factor.
member.returns: The value of maximum permissible quality factor.

member.name: P:WebPDotNet.WebPConfig.QMin
member.summary: Sets or get the value of minimum permissible quality factor.
member.exception: must be greater than or equal to zero.
member.returns: The value of minimum permissible quality factor.

member.name: P:WebPDotNet.WebPConfig.Quality
member.summary: Sets or get the value of quality.
member.returns: The value of quality. For lossy, 0 gives the smallest size and 100 the largest. For lossless, this parameter is the amount of effort put into the compression: 0 is the fastest but gives larger files compared to the slowest, but best, 100.

member.name: P:WebPDotNet.WebPConfig.Segments
member.summary: Sets or get the maximum number of segments to use, from 1 to 4.
member.returns: The maximum number of segments to use, from 1 to 4.

member.name: P:WebPDotNet.WebPConfig.ShowCompressed
member.summary: Sets or get the value indicating whether exports compressed picture back.
member.returns: true if exports compressed picture back, false.

member.name: P:WebPDotNet.WebPConfig.SpatialNoiseShapingStrength
member.summary: Sets or get the value of Spatial Noise Shaping between 0 and 100.
member.returns: The value of Spatial Noise Shaping.

member.name: P:WebPDotNet.WebPConfig.TargetPSNR
member.summary: Sets or get the value to try to achieve minimal distortion.
member.exception: must be greater than or equal to zero.
member.returns: The value to try to achieve minimal distortion.

member.name: P:WebPDotNet.WebPConfig.TargetSize
member.summary: Sets or get the target size, in bytes, to try and reach for the compressed output.
member.exception: must be greater than or equal to zero.
member.returns: The target size, in bytes, to try and reach for the compressed output.

member.name: P:WebPDotNet.WebPConfig.ThreadLevel
member.summary: Sets or get the value indicating whether use multi-threaded encoding.
member.returns: true if using multi-threaded encoding; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:WebPDotNet.WebPConfig.UseDeltaPalette
member.summary: Sets or get the value for reserved for future lossless feature.
member.returns: true if using reserved for future lossless feature; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:WebPDotNet.WebPConfig.UseSharpYUV
member.summary: Sets or get the value indicating whether using sharp (and slow) RGB->YUV conversion.
member.returns: true if using sharp (and slow) RGB->YUV conversion; otherwise, false.

member.summary: Releases all unmanaged resources.

member.summary: Determines whether this instance and another specified object have the same value.

member.returns: true if the value of the parameter is the same as the value of this instance; otherwise, false. If is null, the method returns false.

member.summary: Determines whether this instance and a specified object, which must also be a object, have the same value.
member.param: The to compare to this instance.
member.returns: true if is a and its value is the same as this instance; otherwise, false. If is null, the method returns false.

member.summary: Returns the hash code for this .

member.summary: Specifies the predefined settings for , depending on the type of source picture.

member.summary: Specifies that the default preset.

member.name: F:WebPDotNet.WebPPreset.Picture
member.summary: Specifies that the preset for digital picture, like portrait, inner shot.

member.name: F:WebPDotNet.WebPPreset.Photo
member.summary: Specifies that the preset for outdoor photograph, with natural lighting.

member.summary: Specifies that the preset for hand or line drawing, with high-contrast details.
